General.Name: Duck Yang Ind
General.Description: Duckyang Ind. Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive parts in Korea. Its products include cockpit module subcomponents, instrument panel assembly parts, door trims, battery module assembly products, energy storage systems, carriers, interior and exterior parts, consoles, etc. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.
